All Classes

  • Class Description
    Action  
    ActionHandler
    This is the interface that's dedicated to receiving all the possible actions available to current's turn user and displaying them to said user, so they could choose which one they want to go for.
    ActionHandlerCLI
    This class extends ActionHandler and is dedicated to managing actions on clients side, in case the user chose a CLI based display.
    ActionHandlerGUI
    This class extends ActionHandler and is dedicated to managing actions on clients side, in case the user chose a GUI based display.
    ActionsProvider  
    AdrenalineClient
    Class used by client for communication with server.
    AdrenalineClientRMI  
    AdrenalineClientSocket
    This class implements a Socket based connection with the server and is used only if the user chooses so.
    AdrenalineLauncherClient  
    AdrenalineLauncherServer  
    AdrenalineServer
    This class contains all the info and methods that concern the server side, but are generic enough to be independent from the type of connection that the user has chosen
    AdrenalineServerRMI
    This class provides the server info and methods that are specific to the RMI type connection.
    AdrenalineServerSocket
    This class provides the server info and methods that are specific to the Socket type connection.
    Ammo
    This class represent a set of ammo, it contains all three AmmoColors (Blue, Red, Yellow) and all operations and evaluation that are needed to be done
    AmmoBoxController  
    AmmoCard
    This class includes all the info relative to specific ammo cards present in the game.
    AmmoColor
    This class contains the colors WeaponCards, PowerUpCards and Squares can assume
    AmmoDeck
    This class represent the deck that contains all AmmoCards not currently in play
    AmmoDeckTest  
    AmmoImageView  
    AmmoSquare
    This class represents a square that contains an AmmoCard that can be grabbed
    AmmoSquareTest  
    AmmoTest  
    Animations  
    App  
    Avatar  
    Bot  
    Bot  
    Bottleneck
    Utility class with the goal of throwing a default exception when a ThrowingAction is invoked and it fails.
    Branch
    This class represents a list of actions that are subsequently legal.
    BranchMap
    This class is used to manage all the current branches of actions the player has access to.
    BranchMapFactory
    This class is used to generate default branch maps based on what point of the game we are in and what board state there currently is.
    BranchMapTest  
    BranchTest  
    BranchTestUtilities  
    Cache  
    CardsFactory
    This cards generates the default set of cards that the game is played with.
    CLIMessenger
    This class is used to display messages which need to be communicated to the user.
    CLIMessengerTest  
    CLIParser
    this class reads inputs and makes sure that they're appropriate to the context
    CLIView  
    ColorChoiceController  
    Command<T>  
    CommandQueue
    Utility class used to get a bottle neck effect for when multiple threads should be activated from the server at the same time.
    Controller
    This class is used as a mediator between the server and the model side.
    CounterAttackPowerUpCard
    This class represents a specific type of power up card.
    CounterPowerUpAction
    This class represents a specific case of action.
    Effects
    This class features a width number of public static methods that apply effects to the board state and the players.
    EffectsTest  
    EndBranchAction
    This class represents a specific case of action.
    EndGameController  
    EndGameController.EndGameData  
    EndStartPowerUpCard
    This class represents a specific type of power up card.
    Event<T,​U>
    Utility class used to provide a notification based system.
    ExtendableAction
    This class represents a specific case of action.
    FireModalityAction
    Class used to create the actions that represent the effects of the various weapons present in the game
    FunctionalAction  
    GameBoard
    This class is the board of the game, it contains all the squares, the kill shot track and all the methods to calculate the required squares for actions
    GameBoardSnapshot
    This class contains all info relative to the game board state that clients are going to need.
    GameBoardTest  
    GrabAction
    This class represents a specific case of extendable action.
    GrabActionTest  
    GUIView  
    IAdrenalineServer
    This class is an interface for the server and contains all the methods that can be used regardless of which connection type the user has chosen.
    ICallbackAdrenalineClient  
    IEvent<T,​U>
    Utility class used to provide a notification based system.
    Ifxml<V extends javafx.scene.Parent>  
    IntroController  
    InTurnPowerUpAction
    This class is a specific case of a power up action class.
    InTurnPowerUpCard
    This class represents a specific type of power up card.
    IRMIAdrenalineServer  
    KillShotTrackController  
    Login
    Abstract class used to manage all the initial interactions with the user
    LoginCLI
    Class used to manage all the initial interactions with the user, in case they chose a CLI based display model.
    LoginTest  
    MapChoiceController  
    MapController  
    Match
    This class represent he entire Match, it contains all the references to the Players, the GameBoard, the current Turn and the possible Actions.
    MatchSnapshot
    This class contains all info relative to the match state that clients are going to need.
    MatchSnapshotProvider  
    MatchTest  
    MoveAction
    This class represents a specific case of action.
    MoveActionTest  
    NewLoginGUI  
    NicknameController  
    Player
    This class represent a single playing Player, it contains all infos available to the player
    PlayerCardsController  
    PlayerColor
    This class contains the colors Players can assume
    PlayerSetController  
    PlayersFilter  
    PlayerTest  
    PowerUpAction
    This class is a specific case of a shoot action class.
    PowerUpActionTest  
    PowerUpCard
    This class contains all the generic methods and information common between all different types of power up cards.
    PowerUpDeck
    This class represent the deck that contains all PowerUpCards not currently in play
    PowerUpDeckTest  
    PowerUpSet
    This class represent the PowerUpCards a Player have, every Player can have at most 3 PowerUpCard, the PowerUpCards are divided in three groups: EndStart, InTurn, CounterAttack.
    PowerUpSetTest  
    PrivatePlayerSnapshot
    This class contains all info relative to the current turn's player that clients are going to need.
    PublicPlayerSnapshot
    This class contains info relative to a player (who is not the current player) that clients are going to need.
    ReloadAction
    This class is a specific case of an action class.
    ReloadActionTest  
    RemoteAction
    This class is used to represent sudo-actions on client's side.
    RemoteAction.Data
    This class contains all the possible targets available to the user when they choose to use this action
    RemoteActionsHandler
    This class is used to handle user's decision about which actions they want to go for.
    RemoteActionsProvider  
    RMIListener  
    RollBackAction  
    Room
    This class is used to group all players who are playing on the same match.
    RoomJoinController  
    RoomTimer
    Class used to provide the events and methods relative to the timers used by the turn and login handlers
    SelectionBoxController  
    ShootAction
    This class is used to represent a particular case of actions, therefore it extends Action and provides all the info necessary to define the targets and effects of a player shooting.
    ShootActionTest  
    ShootFunc  
    ShopController  
    SkullChoiceController  
    SocketInputStream  
    SocketInputStream.GetInterface<T,​E extends java.lang.Exception>  
    SocketInputStream.StreamActionInterface  
    SocketOutputStream  
    SocketOutputStream.StreamActionInterface  
    SpawnAndShopSquare
    This class represent one of the Squares where a player can spawn and buy WeaponCards, it contains the WeaponCards the selectionBox of the corresponding color contains
    SpawnAndShopSquareTest  
    Square
    This class describes a generic Square, it must be specialized in either a SpawnAndShopSquare or a AmmoSquare
    SquareBorder
    This class contains the border types that can be found between squares
    SquareController  
    SquaresFilter  
    SquareSnapshot
    This class contains all info relative to a specific square that clients are going to need.
    TargetsFilters  
    TargetsFiltersTest  
    TCPClient
    This class is used to send data via socket by communicating with another instance of the same class.
    TCPClientTest  
    TCPListener
    This class is used as a managing class for all the TCPClients instances that are located server side.
    TCPListenerTest  
    ThrowingAction<E1 extends java.lang.Exception,​E2 extends java.lang.Exception,​E3 extends java.lang.Exception>  
    ThrowingFunc<T>  
    TriConsumer<A,​B,​C>  
    TriFunction<A,​B,​C,​R>  
    Turn
    This class represent a single turn of the Match, it manage the actions a Player can do through the BranchMaps
    TurnTest  
    View  
    ViewElement  
    ViewInterface  
    Visualizable
    Utility class used to convert generic elements into images.
    WeaponCard
    This class contains all the info relative to a weapon card and all the methods that concern the fire modes the weapon has.
    WeaponCardsTest  
    WeaponDeck
    This class represent the deck that contains all WeaponCards not currently in play
    WeaponDeckTest  
    WeaponSelectionAction
    This class is a specific case of an extendable action class.
    WeaponSelectionActionTest
